extendedInfo.description: NO push notificationsNO spyware NO malwareFREE BONUS - cracked glass and squashed mosquitoes backgroundsThe color strikes live wallpaper makes every good party even better! Turn your device on, place it somewhere in the dark, turn the wallpaper on, and ENJOY THE PARTY!Notes:Application can not be moved to SD card.Application is a live wallpaper, to access it on your phone, read your phone manual.Application is intended for display in portrait mode, it will work in landscape mode but display may not be optimal.Application is ad supported  and may contain ads in the notification tray.Application does not require internet access for primary usage, however internet connection may be required to access some functions (for instance link to More free apps and similar).

reviews.title: marysgenes
reviews.comment: very cool...doesn\'t need the fancy screen like cracked glass. works well on my Pantech Crossover. You make alot of cool wallpapers, keep it up!
reviews.author: Mary Kulp

reviews.title: Needs unlock ...
reviews.comment: Might be a 5 star, but unable to make adjustments unless paid for... Looks just like it does in video. A little choppy on LG Optimus S
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: HTC one
reviews.comment: Too choppy and really low resolution. I hope the dev can fix it..it\'s a good concept
reviews.author: Ben Beaini
